query:
SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, COLUMN_DEFAULT, COLUMN_COMMENT
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE()
AND TABLE_NAME = 'pesquisas'
AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('qtdConcorrentesPorMercado', 'qtdLeadsPorMercado', 'qtdProdutosPorCliente')
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4LxBqKfHv1LE9mk.f65588d6698e --database XpSHcSiEisTmX38X46V9tQ --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, COLUMN_DEFAULT, COLUMN_COMMENT
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = DATABASE()
AND TABLE_NAME = 'pesquisas'
AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('qtdConcorrentesPorMercado', 'qtdLeadsPorMercado', 'qtdProdutosPorCliente')
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE	COLUMN_DEFAULT	COLUMN_COMMENT
qtdConcorrentesPorMercado	int	5
